doc.field: For Adults BARS Giordanos Sports Bar: This addition to Giordanos Italian Restaurant is a great place to watch any sporting event. Includes a bar and multiple big-screen TVs. This sports bar is for persons 21 and older. Italian American Club: Located at 30 Ways Lane Kennett Square, Pa 19348. SPECIAL NIGHTS Applebees Karaoke: Every Friday night, Applebees holds a Karaoke night where people can grab the mic and show their talent to well-known songs. The Kennett Flash (located at 102 Sycamore Alley Kennett Square, PA 19348) Open Mic Night: On Fridays, this popular venue holds an open-mic night. Concerts: On Saturdays and Sundays, this venue also hosts concerts of local bands. Newtons Quizo: On Tuesday nights, this bar on State Street hosts a game, "Quizo", which is another trivia game. For Teens YMCA Youth Dance: One Saturday a month, the local YMCA hosts a dance for kids between sixth and eighth grade. The Garage (located at 115 S Union St Kennett Square, PA 19348) Concerts: This is a youth center that hosts local bands for the adolescents on weekends.
